overview:
Technologist, Management Consultant, Brand Advisor, Process Improvement Expert.

Has served as a strategic advisor to companies such as Amazon.com, Apple Inc., Autodesk, Coca-Cola, First Data, Hilton Hotels, IBM, Microsoft Corporation, Netscape Communications, SONY, and The Walt Disney Company.

Raised in excess of $120 million for clients and assisted in the mergers and acquisitions of 40+ companies directly and through the Los Angeles-based firm he founded in 1999.

Founded an Internet technology company in 1994 that he took public in 1999 and stepped down from in 2005. The company achieved a market capitalization exceeding $1 billion in 2000.

Certified Master Black Belt in Strategic Six Sigma. Expert in process improvement methods such as Six Sigma, TQM, ToC, and ERM. Charter Member of D: All Things D.

Proponent of cloud computing and Software-as-a-Service (SaaS).

Available as a contract Chief Executive Officer or Chief Strategy Officer on a permanent or interim basis.
